            <entry>7435fe76-b10c-4675-8cb1-31dd2e56057e#1#3</entry>

          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az alaplap sokszög</string>
            <string language="en">The base is a polygon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Unterseite ist ein Polygon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La base est un polygone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A base é um polygon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La base è un poligono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βάση είναι ένα πολύγωνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La base es un polígono</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Tetszőleges egyenes hasáb alaplapját szemléltető ábra</string>
            <string language="en">Figure demonstrating the base of an optional right prism</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">alaplap, sokszög</string>
            <string language="en">base, polygon</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie das Demonstrieren der Unterseite eines
wahlweise freigestellten rechten Prismas dar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Figure démontrer la base d'un prisme droit 
facultatif</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Figure demonstrar a base de um prisma direito 
opcional</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcoli la dimostrazione della base di un prisma 
di destra facoltativo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αριθμός που καταδεικνύει τη βάση ενός προαιρετικού 
σωστού πρίσματος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calcule demostrar la base de un prisma derecho 
opcional</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterseite, Polygon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">base, polygone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">base, polygon</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">base, polígono</string>
          </keyword>
